summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank for the month of February 2018. It details various outgoing money transfers to different accounts and provides a snapshot of the financial activity during that period.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the financial transactions detailed in the document.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, USVI 00802
keyFacts: The document details Jeffrey Epstein's account balance at Deutsche Bank from February 1, 2018, to February 28, 2018.
The beginning balance on February 1, 2018, was $231,806.28.
Significant outgoing transfers included $150,000 to Morgan Chase Bank and $20,000 to an unspecified account.
The ending balance as of February 28, 2018, was $165,778.44.
The document includes various fees and credits related to the account, indicating active financial management.
